name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A magical scroll that contains the spell to cast a fireball.
looks: The scroll is made of fine parchment and is adorned with intricate runes.

special_effects.burning: Targets hit by the fireball have a chance to catch on fire and take damage over time.

name: Healing Herbs
description: A bundle of healing herbs used to restore health.
looks: A collection of colorful, fragrant herbs bundled together with a ribbon.

name: Vision Enhancing Elixir
description: An elixir that enhances the user's vision for a short duration.
looks: The elixir is contained in a small glass bottle with a cork stopper. The liquid inside is clear and sparkles when held up to the light.

name: Bow of the Forest
description: A beautifully crafted bow made from enchanted wood.
looks: The bow is made from a combination of oak and ash wood, intricately carved with nature-inspired designs.

special_weapon_skills.archery: Increases accuracy and damage while using a bow.

special_effects.nature_blessing: Occasionally releases a burst of nature energy, damaging enemies and healing allies.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the Fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and sealed with wax.

special_effects.ignite: Sets target on fire, dealing additional damage over time

name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that temporarily boosts the drinker's strength and melee damage.
looks: The potion is a vibrant red color, swirling with energy.

special_effects.Strength Boost: Increases strength by 5 points for 10 minutes.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak that grants the wearer the ability to become invisible.
looks: The cloak is made of a lightweight, shimmering fabric that seems to change colors depending on the light.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants the wearer the ability to become invisible for a limited period of time.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A small dagger coated in a deadly poison.
looks: The dagger has a short, sharp blade with a dark green tint, indicating the poison coating.

special_effects.poison_damage: Causes continuous poison damage over time to the target.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A powerful sword imbued with magic.
looks: The sword has a shining blade with intricate runes carved along its surface.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Increases damage done with this sword by 10%

special_effects.fire_attack: Has a chance to ignite enemies on fire

name: Dagger of the Swift
description: A sharp and deadly dagger that increases attack speed.
looks: The dagger is made of a sleek and shiny black metal. Its blade is curved and glimmers in the light.

special_weapon_skils.dagger_mastery: Increases accuracy and damage with daggers.
